Name: Chinese Rail SIm
About the game: Rebuild the whole rail network Play as the lead rail engineer, start with a completely empty map of China, you can build stations, tracks, trains to create your own rail network, it's up to you to figure out how to transport millions of people effectively. Realistic travel data The game uses data that are very close to the real life(Population, GDP) to simulate the actual travel needs of millions of Chinese people. Strategy You will be given a limited amount of funds, so you better use them wisely, you have to transport certain amount of passengers in each time period or else you will be fired. But fear not, it's all up to you to plan the rail system, if you are smart and experienced enough, you will get it going. What you will experience in this game Complete empty Chinese map with authentic travel needs Build the rail system, design travel path Turn a empty map to a sophisticated, connected rail system
